lead_paragraph: A slick city kid visits his crusty sheep-ranching grandfather for the first time in nine years during a trip to the desolate Badlands in North Dakota, and the two learn they can both learn a lot from each other despite their vast differences.
snippet: A slick city kid visits his crusty sheep-ranching grandfather for the first time in nine years during a trip to the desolate Badlands in North Dakota, and the two learn they can both learn a lot from each other despite their vast differences.
